main.name: Evan Warburton
main.description: I am a recent computer science graduate who is interested in space technology as well as Machine Learning and AI
main.bio: I have a broad range of interests including science fiction, international relations and history. I think AI and machine learning provide huge potential for jumps in technology in practically any field, and I am intersted in getting involved with the industry.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me about my previous projects or for any other information about myself.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience with various languages from my work on personal and school projects.

education.description: I majored in Computer Science through a BA, which allowed me to study Political Sciences, History and Philosophy alongside my Computer Science Courses

work.title: Technical Lead
work.description: Setting up an Agricultural website for a client in Kenya. The website provided crop and geographic information for farmers. Involved setting up webhosting, creating a React Frontend, Nodejs Backend and Postgresql database.

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer
work.description: Working with physics, engineering and other computer science students to develop an atmosphere research experiment. Personal focus was on creating a ML model for segmenting and classifying images gathered. Project is on temporary hold due to pandemic.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Research on preemptively predicting failures or attacks on a cyber physical system using random forests.

projects.title: Number Generation with GAN
projects.category: A sample project of using a GAN to generate numbers.

projects.title: Agronome Agriculture
projects.category: A service for Kenyan farmers to access crop and geographical information usefull to crop production. Final product is still in development.
